desc: Designer grab bars, portable showers and fixtures for the home based on universal design for wheelchair and handicap accessibility, home safety.

layout.text: BEAUTIFULLY AESTHETIC, QUALITY, DISTINCTIVE PRODUCTS AND ADAPTIVE DEVICES FOR THE HOME ... SOURCED FROM AROUND THE WORLD AND RECOMMENDED BY OCCUPATIONAL THERAPY EXPERTS ... BASED ON PRINCIPLES OF UNIVERSAL DESIGN FOR ACCESSIBILITY ... PROMOTING SAFE AND COMFORTABLE LIFESTYLE INDEPENDENCE.
